library(RPostgreSQL)
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")
source("chart_functions.R")

pillars_conn <- connect_to_db("rjs_pillars")

df <- dbGetQuery(pillars_conn, "SELECT * FROM report_stoprates_age_race_gang_person")

age<-dbGetQuery(pillars_conn, "SELECT * FROM population_age_race_sd_city")%>%
  mutate(race=ifelse(race %in% "latino", "latinx", race))%>%
  rename("pop_count"="count",
         "pop_rate"="rate")


meta<-dbGetQuery(pillars_conn, "SELECT * FROM metadata_race_labels")

df<-df%>%
  left_join(age)%>%
  left_join(meta, by=c("race"="race_base"))%>%
  filter(race!='sswana' & race !="nhpi" & race != 'aian')%>%
mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~round(., 1)))%>%
  mutate(tooltip=ifelse(race %in% "nh_sswana", "",  paste0("By comparison, <b>",race_label_short, " people</b> make up <b>",pop_rate,"%</b> of the population ages <b>",age_bracket,"</b> in San Diego.")))


text <- "Across all people aged <b>{point.age_bracket:.1f}</b> stopped by officers assigned to gang enforcement, officers stopped people perceived as <b>{point.race_label_short:.1f}</b> <b>{point.rate:.1f}% of the time</b>. {point.tooltip}"

tooltip_text <- sapply(strwrap(text, 110, simplify=FALSE), paste, collapse="<br>")

## Set colors ##

group_colors <- c(meteorite, lavender, papaya, peridot, ccblue, gainsboro, "#211447",
                         "#FF9E0D", "#A8683C")

# set order of stacking within bars

df <- within(df, race_label_short <- factor(race_label_short, levels=c("White","Multiracial", "SWANA/SA", "NHPI","AIAN", "Asian",  "Latinx","Black")))

# add methodnote
methodnote <- "Analysis for all officer-initiated stops made by officers assigned to gang enforcement."

# create caption
caption_text <- paste("<br><br>", racenote, sourcenote, methodnote)

# graph

chart<-hchart(df, 
         "bar", hcaes(x = age_bracket, y = rate, group =race_label_short),
         stacking = "normal",
         tooltip =  list(headerFormat='',pointFormat=tooltip_text)) %>%
    
    hc_title(
      text = "Officers assigned to gang enforcement disproportionately stop people they perceive as Black and Latinx across all age groups") %>%
    
    hc_subtitle(
      text = "Percent of people who are stopped by officers assigned to gang enforcement by race and age") %>%

    
    hc_caption(
      text = caption_text) %>%
    
    hc_yAxis(max=100,
             title = list(text = paste0(""))) %>%
    
    hc_xAxis( categories=list("17 and under","18-24","25-34","35-44","45-54", "55-64", "65 and older"),
              title = list(text = paste0(""),
                          labels=list(position="bottom"))) %>%
    
    hc_legend(enabled = TRUE, 
              reversed =  TRUE,
              x=20)%>% 
    
    hc_add_theme(cc_theme)%>%
    
    hc_colors(group_colors) %>%
    hc_chart(
      marginRight=120) %>%
    
    hc_exporting(
      enabled = TRUE, sourceWidth=900, sourceHeight=600, 
      chartOptions=list(plotOptions=list(series=list(dataLabels=list(enabled=TRUE,format='{point.rate:.1f}%')))),
      filename = paste0("Percent of stops made by officers assigned to gang enforcement by race and age","_Catalyst California, catalystcalifornia.org, 2023."),
      buttons=list(contextButton=list(menuItems=list('downloadPNG', 'downloadSVG',
                                                     'downloadXLS', 'downloadCSV'))))





dbDisconnect(pillars_conn)
